mapper.update: update TBL_CART set amount=#{amount} where cart_id=#{cartId}
update TBL_CART set amount=amount+#{amount} where cart_id=#{cartId}
mapper.select: select cart_id,c.user_id,user_name,c.pd_id,pd_name,pd_price,amount from TBL_CART c inner join TBL_PRODUCT p on c.pd_id=p.pd_id inner join TBL_MEMBER m on c.user_id=m.user_id where c.user_id =#{userId}
select sum(pd_price*amount) from TBL_CART c inner join TBL_PRODUCT p on c.pd_id = p.pd_id where user_id = #{userId}
select cart_id,c.pd_id from TBL_CART c inner join TBL_PRODUCT p on c.pd_id=p.pd_id inner join TBL_MEMBER m on c.user_id=m.user_id where c.user_id =#{userId} and c.pd_id = #{pdId}
